Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Adds sewer connections to the septic system replacement fund
Summary: Adds sewer connections to the septic system replacement fund to residential sewer connection projects.
LawCode: Amd ยง1285-u, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to the septic system replacement and sewer connection fund
